06 n. 01   [[ου]] del m1
author: anon.
genre: list of words or gnomai monostichoi?
contents: beginnings of lines starting mostly with ou-
statepreservation: papyrus piece (3 x 6.6 cm), containing the remains of a single column on each side (2 cm maximum width); along the fibres, the beginnings of 9 lines have been preserved; across the fibres, with the writing upside down in relation to the other side, stand the beginnings of 6 lines. Right-hand margin has not been preserved on either side; nor has the upper margin along the fibres; measurements of left-hand and lower margins along the fibres are 1.2 cm and 0.8 cm, respectively. Across the fibres measurements are: upper margin, 2.3 cm; left-hand margin, 0.8 cm (maximum preserved); lower margin has not been preserved.
lectionalsigns: correction by writing over the wrongly written letters.
hand: informal sloping of generous size; skilled and mostly with separate letters, but without keeping regular spacing between lines and characters; roughly bilinear.
